<http://pythonhosted.org/anybox.recipe.openerp>`_
<http://sphinx-doc.org>`_, built continuously and
<https://wiki.python.org/moin/PyPiDocumentationHosting>`_ for details.
(needed for interactive session and various scripts)
trans-unit.target: (대화 형 세션 및 다양한 스크립트에 필요)

trans-unit.source: (openerp, odoo, whatever).
* Christophe Combelles
* Code repository and bug tracker: https://launchpad.net/anybox.recipe.openerp
* Georges Racinet
* Jacques-Etienne Baudoux
* Jean-Sébastien Suzanne
* Laetitia Gangloff
* Laurent Mignon
* Leonardo Pistone
* Main documentation: http://docs.anybox.fr/anybox.recipe.openerp
* PyPI page: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/anybox.recipe.openerp
* Sandy Carter
* Sebastian Kennedy
* Stéphane Bidoul
* Stefan Rijnhart
* Yannick Vaucher
* ability to pinpoint everything for replayability
trans-unit.target: * 재생성을 위해 모든 것을 정확히 찾아내는 능력

trans-unit.source: * dedicated scripts creation for easy integration of external tools,
trans-unit.target: * 외부 도구의 손쉬운 통합을위한 전용 스크립트 생성,

trans-unit.source: * installation of OpenERP server and, if meaningful, GTK and web clients.
trans-unit.target: * OpenERP 서버 및 의미있는 경우 GTK 및 웹 클라이언트 설치.

trans-unit.source: * management of OpenERP configuration
* packaging: creation of self-contained equivalents for easy
trans-unit.target: * 패키징 : 쉬운 자체 포함 등가물 생성

trans-unit.source: * retrieval of main software and addons from various sources,
trans-unit.target: * 다양한 소스에서 주요 소프트웨어 및 애드온 검색,

trans-unit.source: * uniformity across OpenERP versions (from 5.0 onwards)
trans-unit.target: * OpenERP 버전 간 균일 성 (5.0 이상)

trans-unit.source: - Added an 'addons' option allowing remote repositories and local directories
trans-unit.target: -원격 저장소 및 로컬 디렉토리를 허용하는 '애드온'옵션 추가

trans-unit.source: - Added support for the web client and gtk client
trans-unit.target: -웹 클라이언트 및 gtk 클라이언트에 대한 지원 추가

trans-unit.source: - Basic tests for Git and Svn
- Clean-up and refactoring
- Create gtk client config without starting it
- Faster tarball inspection (see lp issue #984237)
- Fixed an error in user feedback if openerp-command package is missing but
trans-unit.target: -openerp-command 패키지가없는 경우 사용자 피드백 오류 수정

trans-unit.source: - Fixed the licence in ``setup.py`` and hence on PyPI page. The ZPL
- Handle bad Babel import in setup.py
- Improved documentation (bootstrap and sample buildouts)
trans-unit.target: -개선 된 문서 (부트 스트랩 및 샘플 빌드 아웃)

trans-unit.source: - Improved error messages
- Initial implementation for the OpenERP server only
- Make the "dsextras" error more explicit (install PyGObject and PyGTK)
trans-unit.target: - "dsextras"오류를 더 명확하게 만듭니다 (PyGObject 및 PyGTK 설치).

trans-unit.source: - Nothing but fix of changelog RST
- Overwrite config files each time
- Pass the trailing args to the startup script of the server
- Re-enabled support for trunk nightly (and maybe 7.0 final)
- Refactor with classes of VCS package
- Refactored the documentation
- Removed `url` option (download url supported through `version`)
trans-unit.target: -`url` 옵션 제거 (`version`을 통해 지원되는 다운로드 URL)

trans-unit.source: - SAAS versions now recognized, and treated as X.5
- Shared downloads and more generally configurable downloads
trans-unit.target: -공유 다운로드 및보다 일반적으로 구성 가능한 다운로드

trans-unit.source: - Support OpenERP 6.1 and 6.0
- Support offline mode of buildout
- Updated the documentation
- Use dotted notation to add openerp options in the generated configs
trans-unit.target: -생성 된 구성에 openerp 옵션을 추가하려면 점 표기법을 사용하십시오.

trans-unit.source: - [bzr] support for lightweight checkout, with uniform 'bzr-init' option
trans-unit.target: -[bzr] 균일 한 'bzr-init'옵션으로 간단한 체크 아웃 지원

trans-unit.source: - first release, skimmed from anybox.recipe.openerp 1.9.0
- fixed URL and filenames for nightlies
trans-unit.target: -야간 용 고정 URL 및 파일 이름

trans-unit.source: - fixed a packaging problem with openerp-cron-worker in 1.1.2
- fixed a packaging problem with openerp-cron-worker in 1.1.4
- fixed config file creation
- fixed some deps
- fixed the sample buildouts in the readme file
- gevent script generation backported to version 7.saas~3 and following
trans-unit.target: -gevent 스크립트 생성은 버전 7.saas ~ 3 및 다음으로 백 포트되었습니다.

- github PR #5: ``ir_model_data`` helpers for
- handle deploying custom bzr branches
- handle new sections in openerp config
- improved the doc
- included buildout configurations for buildbotting of the recipe in source
